name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, adept in utilizing **AWS**, **Google Cloud Services**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** to deliver comprehensive solutions tailored for the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in managing databases including **MS SQL Server**, **Oracle**, and **PostgreSQL**, and ensuring robust data integrity across platforms. Skilled in programming languages such as **JavaScript** and **Python**, leveraging these technologies for seamless integration and RESTful API development.

Accomplished in building high-performance applications with an emphasis on AI/ML integration for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My extensive experience includes facilitating CI/CD automation and ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I excel in crafting event-driven architectures and implementing microservices to enhance system efficiency and performance.
